content:
CS-S SA Light smoke and acoustic sealant Lightweight, paintable smoke and acoustic sealant for drywall joints and pipe penetrations (including CPVC) ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Rapid installation – best-in-class tooling and dispensing, helping you achieve a clean finish in just one pass Up to 44% lighter than comparable smoke/acoustic sealants – for safer transport and faster progress on the jobsite, especially when sealing overhead joints FBC™ System Compatible – sealant suitable for a wide range of Lubrizol CPVC pipes and fittings Proudly made in the USA – for shorter lead times and supporting local jobs Low VOCs – smoke and acoustic sealant formulated to meet LEED® V4 project requirements Applications Sealing construction joints in drywall and other internal partitions Sealing around penetrations for sprinkler and water lines, including Lubrizol CPVC pipes For bituminous coated cast iron pipe compatibility, please contact Hilti for details For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Chemical basis: Water-based acrylic dispersion Color: White Shelf life: 24 Months Technical Data | Chemical basis | Water-based acrylic dispersion | Color | White | Shelf life | 24 Months | 1 | Acoustics performance | Test report available | Movement | ±12.5% (ISO 11600) | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 0
Smoke development: 0 | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 35 - 104 °F | Average volume shrinkage | 29 % | Storage and transportation temperature range | 35 - 95 °F | Temperature resistance range | -4 - 176 °F | Can be painted | Yes | Base materials | Concrete, Drywall, Metal | at 77°F/25°C and 50% relative humidity; from date of manufacture ### ITEMS- 2305383 - S+A sealant light CS- S SA 20 Oz foil - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x CS-S SA 20 Oz S+A sealant light foil - 2305384 - S+A sealant light CS- S SA 5GAL pail - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CS-S SA 5GAL S+A sealant light pail - 3754083 - CS-S SA Light sealant 20oz foil (3 cases + 1 disp) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Foil pack dispenser manual CS 270-P1 - 60x CS-S SA 20 Oz S+A sealant light foil - 3751032 - CS-S SA Light sealant 20oz foil (3 cases) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 60x CS-S SA 20 Oz S+A sealant light foil - 3754085 - CS-S SA Light sealant 20oz foils (15cases + pneu disp) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Foil dispenser, pneumatic - 300x CS-S SA 20 Oz S+A sealant light foil - 3847226 - CS-S SA Light foil pallet (32 cases) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 640x CS-S SA 20 Oz S+A sealant light foil - 3847227 - SA Light foil pallet Nuron Disp (32) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CD 4-22 Cordl. dispenser - 1x Barrel CD 4 long assembly set - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 640x CS-S SA 20 Oz S+A sealant light foil - 2x B 22-85 Li-ion Battery pack - 3754089 - CS-S SA Light sealant 5 gal (18 pails) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x CS-S SA 5GAL S+A sealant light pail - 3847228 - SA Light foil pallet (32) & 10 Disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 10x Foil pack dispenser manual CS 270-P1 - 640x CS-S SA 20 Oz S+A sealant light foil - 3754091 - CS-S SA Light sealant 5 gal (36 pails) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 36x CS-S SA 5GAL S+A sealant light pail
